about-bio: Visual artist working with acrylic and watercolor, combining geometric forms with organic abstraction. I explore themes of motherhood, family dynamics, national identity, and spiritual growth. Graduate of the National Academy of Fine Arts and Culture (Kyiv) and a master‚Äôs degree in biomechanics of Hatha yoga from the National University of Physical Education and Sport of Ukraine. Since 2020 I have exhibited in Kyiv, Lviv, Krakow, Vienna, Gars am Kamp, Berlin, Munich, Nuremberg, Kiel, Brunswick, Paris, and Toronto.
about-exhibition-1: Art Fair ‚Äú30. Kunstmarkt‚Äù, Kunsthaus BBK, Braunschweig, Germany (2024).
about-exhibition-2: Solo exhibition ‚ÄúWhen the Sky Falls‚Äù, Shevchenko Museum, Toronto, Canada (2024).
about-exhibition-3: Solo exhibition ‚ÄúForced Migration‚Äù, Museum of the Ukrainian diaspora, Kyiv, Ukraine (2023).
about-media-text: Interviews about restorative art in local media, collaborations with wellness brands.
